name: Twisty Tornado
description:
Gameplay and Audio: JonasMG

Art: Kuang-Yu Cheng (https://cheng8141.itch.io/)

You control a tornado set out to do one thing. Blow up the world so it finally can get peace.

Control with W A S D

Buy upgrades with the mouse

The "Whirl" criteria was used by the tornado, it whirls, twirls and spins around

The "Mischevious" criteria was also used by the tornado, it's causing mischief to all the innocent people :(

The "Happy" criteria was yet again taken by the tornado, because it brings joy to it, when everyone is DEAD

The "Upbeat Sounds" criteria wasn't taken by the tornado... Unless it made the music!
